import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import React from 'react'; import css from './Profile/Profile.module.css'; export const Profile = ({ username, tag, location, avatar, stats: { followers, views, likes } }) => { return (

{username}

@{tag}

{location}

  • Followers {followers ? followers : 0}
  • Views {views ? views : 0}
  • Likes {likes ? likes : 0}
); }; Profile.propTypes = { username: PropTypes.string.isRequired, tag: PropTypes.string.isRequired, location: PropTypes.string.isRequired, avatar: PropTypes.string.isRequired, stats: PropTypes.object.isRequired, };
